source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_00<tab>Curious Gorge seems surprisingly calm and collected.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_00<tab>再会の市のキュリアス・ゴージは、どことなく穏やかな表情をしている。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_01<tab>In an unusual change of pace, Curious Gorge has taken to helping merchants of Reunion with errands. He has been recently tasked with taking two horses up to Mol Iloh, but is wary of leaving one without a rider. He asks you to speak with the horses' owner, so you might saddle up to assist him.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_01<tab>キュリアスゴージから、馬を届けるよう頼まれた。再会の市の「陽気な遊牧民」と話して「馬」に騎乗させてもらおう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_02<tab>The sprightly merchant is only too happy to ready his horse for you. Mounted and ready to ride, he wishes you save travels to Mol Iloh.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_02<tab>陽気な遊牧民と話して馬に騎乗した。馬に騎乗した状態で、アジムステップのモル・イローにいる「モル族の羊飼い」のもとへ行き「馬」を届けよう。

※再会の市にいる「陽気な遊牧民」に話しかけると「馬」に騎乗できます。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_03<tab>As you arrive at Mol Iloh, a sheepherder approaches you. His look of satisfaction makes clear that he is the intended recipient of the horse. With the delivery complete, you look for Curious Gorge who should be nearby.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_03<tab>モル族の羊飼いに馬を届けた。モル・イローの「キュリアス・ゴージ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_04<tab>Robbed of his inner beast and ability to battle, Curious Gorge has thought long and hard about what life has to offer off the battlefield. He realizes now the vexing emotion which inhibited his inner beast was the love he bears for Dorgono. This understanding of his feelings has also reawakened his once-dormant strength. To cast aside any lingering feelings of doubt or hesitation, he plans to profess his love to her. To that end, he bids you follow him back to Reunion.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_04<tab>キュリアス・ゴージと話した。彼はドルゴノに恋していることに気づき、気持ちを伝えることにしたようだ。再会の市へ戻った「キュリアス・ゴージ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_05<tab>Both Curious Gorge and Dorgono have been waiting for your return. His look of exasperation makes it clear he has buckled under pressure. Your presence offers him a modicum of courage, but before he can say a word, she interrupts him to relay grave news to you─the Chaghan have grown bolder, and now plan to attack Mol Iloh. She means to cut them off before they can reach the settlement and leaves ahead of you. Curious Gorge grows increasingly frustrated with himself, and asks you to give him the one thing certain to dispel his fear─the realm-shattering slap of Eorzea's greatest warrior!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_05<tab>キュリアス・ゴージと合流したところ、ドルゴノが戻っていた。彼女によると、チャガン族はモル・イローを襲撃しようとしているようだ。キュリアス・ゴージは、ドルゴノに気持ちを伝えることができなかった。彼を励ますために、再会の市の「キュリアス・ゴージ」にエモート「平手打ち」をしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_06<tab>It is all Curious Gorge can do not to fall to the ground from the force of your mighty blow. He is now duly inspired and ready to help Dorgono rout the Chaghan.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_06<tab>キュリアス・ゴージに平手打ちをした。チャガン族を倒すために、モル・イロー付近へ向かった「ドルゴノ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_07<tab>You find Dorgono south of the settlement, surveying the area for the Chaghan. The silent operation is foiled, however, by the boisterous bellowing of Curious Gorge as he attempts to profess his love to her. Your cover blown, a fierce battle with the Chaghan soon ensues. The song of steel echoes across the Azim Steppe, and after the final refrain, you find yourselves victorious. Or so it seems. The Chaghan are defeated, but the threat of danger still looms in Curious Gorge who has been overcome by his inner beast. Though he seems beyond reasoning, it is a confession of love from Dorgono that brings him back to his senses.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_07<tab>ドルゴノと合流した。キュリアス・ゴージはドルゴノに思いを伝えて不調を乗り越え、三人でチャガン族を倒すことができた。アジムステップのキュリアス・ゴージと勝利を分かち合おう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_08<tab>Love is in the air, and Dorgono asks Curious Gorge to return with her to start anew as part of the Qerel clan. With a heavy heart he declines. Control of his inner beast still eludes him, and he cannot suffer the thought of hurting the one he loves most. He vows to become the realm's second─or third─strongest warrior, hoping to someday be worthy of her affection. Dorgono bids you both farewell and departs to at last rejoin her people.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_08<tab>キュリアス・ゴージはまたも「原初の魂」に飲まれてしまい、ドルゴノの言葉で我に返るのだった。ドルゴノは部族のもとへ帰っていった。モル・イロー付近の「キュリアス・ゴージ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_09<tab>Curious Gorge is a man of his word, and jokingly warns you that, should you decide to rest on your laurels for even a moment, he intends to rob you of your title of realm's greatest warrior. That said, he concedes you both have earned rest after such a grueling battle. Longing for home, you both return to Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_09<tab>キュリアス・ゴージと話した。低地ラノシアのモラビー造船廠にいる「ブロークン・マウンテン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_10<tab>Broken Mountain is relieved to see you both returned safely, hopeful that things would return to as they were. Unfortunately that would not be the case. Still struggling to control his inner beast, Curious Gorge again relinquishes his position as instructor to resume training at Hidden Falls. Though his brother is certain to emerge from his training a warrior transformed, Broken Mountain hopes you will answer their call should the realm want for a mighty axe.

※The next warrior quest will be available from Curious Gorge once you have met the following requirements:
※ FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers must be registered to your service account.
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”
※ You must have completed the role quest “To Have Loved and Lost.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SEQ_10<tab>ブロークン・マウンテンと話した。キュリアス・ゴージは、今回の一件で戦士隊の教官を辞めることにしたようだ。これからも修行を続けるという彼に負けないよう、鍛錬を続けよう。

※以下の条件を満たすと、隠れ滝のキュリアス・ゴージから、新たなジョブクエストを受注することができます。
1.「漆黒のヴィランズ」のプレイ権を所有している。
2.「メインクエスト：漆黒のヴィランズ」の、
　「漆黒のヴィランズ」を完了する。
3.TANKロールの「ロールクエスト」を完了する。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_00<tab>Mount the merchant's horse.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_00<tab>陽気な遊牧民と話して馬に乗る

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_01<tab>Ride the merchant's horse to Mol Iloh.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_01<tab>馬に乗ってモル族の羊飼いのもとへ行く

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_02<tab>キュリアス・ゴージと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_03<tab>再会の市のキュリアス・ゴージと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_04<tab>Dispel Curious Gorge's fear with a /slap.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_04<tab>キュリアス・ゴージにエモート「平手打ち」をする

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_05<tab>Meet with Dorgono near Mol Iloh.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_05<tab>モル・イロー付近のドルゴノと合流

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_06<tab>Meet with Dorgono near Mol Iloh.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_06<tab>モル・イロー付近のドルゴノと合流

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Curious Gorge.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_07<tab>キュリアス・ゴージと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Broken Mountain at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_TODO_08<tab>モラビー造船廠のブロークン・マウンテンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Stars in the Dark.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>本クエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：紅蓮のリベレーター」の、
「神託とともに」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>Your timing is impeccable as always. I have a task well suited to a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of your many talents.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_000<tab>おお、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ちょうどいいところに来たな。
急なんだが、ちょっと手を貸してくれねえか？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>Aside from my training, I've taken to working with the merchants here in Reunion, my most recent venture being the delivery of horses.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_001<tab>実はオラ、ここの商人たちとすっかり仲良くなって、
「馬」を買った客まで届けるという仕事を手伝ってるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>I was asked to take a pair of horses up north today, but I'd feel at ease knowing there was a rider in both saddles.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_002<tab>だが、大口の注文が入って、オラだけでは手が足りねえんだよ。
そこで、オメにも馬に乗って、客まで届けてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>Speak with the sprightly fellow over there and he'll see that you're fit to ride. Make for Mol Iloh and I'll meet you there.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_003<tab>市場の「陽気な遊牧民」に声をかけ、馬に乗せてもらって、
客が待つモル・イローまで、ひとっ走りしてくれ。
オラは先に行ってるから、向こうで落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_05<tab>This isn't a job to be done on foot, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Speak with the sprightly fellow over there and saddle up.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_05<tab>あれ？　オメ、馬はどうした？
再会の市の「陽気な遊牧民」に声をかけ、
馬に乗せてもらって、ここにいる客まで届けてくれよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SHEPHERD02903_100_006<tab>Have you seen any merchants on horseback heading this way? <sigh> They should have been here by now.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SHEPHERD02903_100_006<tab>あれ？　馬はまだかな？
再会の市の「陽気な遊牧民」に注文した馬を、
ここまで届けてもらうはずなんだがね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_007<tab>Return to the mirthful merchant and mount the horse to be delivered to Mol Iloh.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_007<tab>再会の市の「陽気な遊牧民」に話しかけ、
「馬」に騎乗した状態で、「モル族の羊飼い」のもとに来ましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_MERCHANT02903_000_008<tab>(-Mirthful Merchant-)Ah, Curious Gorge did mention someone would be coming to help. Yes, yes, your horse is right over here. Safe travels, friend.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_MERCHANT02903_000_008<tab>アンタが、ゴージの言ってたヤツだな……？
じゃあ、この馬をモル・イローにいる、
「モル族の羊飼い」まで、届けてくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_MERCHANT02903_000_009<tab>(-Mirthful Merchant-)What were you doing out there? Your horse came galloping back not long ago and looked rather spooked. I'll tolerate no funny business. Understand?
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_MERCHANT02903_000_009<tab>おいおい、馬が戻ってきてしまったぞ……。
今度こそ、途中で降りずにモル・イローにいる、
「モル族の羊飼い」まで、届けてくれよな！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SHEPHERD02903_000_010<tab>Ah, my horse! Thank you so much. I don't know where I'd be without you adventurers. Is the other burly-looking fellow over there with you?
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SHEPHERD02903_000_010<tab>ありがとう、これで注文した馬がすべて届いた。
たくさんの羊を飼うには、馬も数が必要なんでね。
先に届けてくれた人なら、集落の外れで待ってたよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SHEPHERD02903_000_011<tab>Don't let me keep you. It'd be rude to leave that friend of yours waiting any longer.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SHEPHERD02903_000_011<tab>ありがとう、これで注文した馬がすべて届いた。
たくさんの羊を飼うには、馬も数が必要なんでね。
先に届けてくれた人なら、集落の外れで待ってたよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_015<tab>Ah, there you are. Was this not invigorating? The feeling of fresh air on your face, the wind blowing through your hair?
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_015<tab>手伝ってくれて、ありがとよ。
いいもんだろ、この壮大な草原を馬で駆け抜けるって……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_016<tab>Bereft of the strength to fight, I have been given much time to drink in the beauty of these lands. Much time to think...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_016<tab>オラ、幼い頃から戦士として強くなることばかり考えてきた。
でも、戦えなくなって、この異郷の大草原で、
初めて、戦士ってものから離れたんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_017<tab>Since I was old enough to hold an axe, the path of the warrior is all I have ever known, the pursuit of ever greater strength my only purpose. I realize now how narrow my view of the world was.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_017<tab>すると、己がいかに戦士や戦いのことばかりで、
何も見えてなかったのかわかった……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_018<tab>I was convinced my defeat at the Wolves' Den Pier was the reason Dorgono has been constantly on my mind, and my wounded pride served only to further cloud my judgment.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_018<tab>オラ、ドルゴノに負けたから悔しくて、
アイツのことが気になってるんだと思ってたが……。
それは、戦士としての誇りが、思いを曇らせていただけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_019<tab>But I can see clearly now, the clouds are gone. I finally understand why Dorgono has vexed me so.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_019<tab>そんな、雲が晴れて、
やっと己の本当の気持ちに気づいたんだよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab>I love her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. From the moment I laid eyes on her, she had holmganged my heart.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_020<tab>オラは……ドルゴノに……恋をしてるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_021<tab>Overwhelmed with these feelings, it's little wonder she trounced me so at the Wolves' Den Pier.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_021<tab>アイツに負けたのは、
弱かったからでも、修行が足りなかったからでもねえ。
本当は、オラがドルゴノに、恋してしまったからだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_022<tab>But I am once more master of my emotions. Already I can feel my inner beast has reawakened.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_022<tab>それに気づいてから、オラ少しずつ、
前のように、「原初の魂」が震えるようになってきた。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_023<tab>If I am to regain my full strength, there is only one thing left to do: profess my love to Dorgono, and in the doing, rid myself of any lingering doubts that may still inhibit my inner beast.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_023<tab>でも、まだ本調子じゃねえ。
オラ、ドルゴノが戻ってきたら、この気持ちを伝える。
そうすることで、オラはこの壁を乗り越えられるはずだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_024<tab>Let us return to town. Hopefully there will be enough time before she arrives to think of what to say.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_024<tab>さあ、再会の市へ戻ろう。
あとは、アイツが帰ってくるのを待つだけだな。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_029<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank goodness you are here.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_029<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
大変だ！　大変なんだよ……！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030<tab>What took you so long? Every time I look into those powder blue eyes of hers, I lose all train of thought. Now that you're here, perhaps I can muster the courage to─erm, ahem!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_030<tab>ド、ドルゴノが戻ってきてたんだ……。
よし、オラ、思いを伝えるぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031<tab>Dorgono! I... I... I lo─
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031<tab>ドルゴノ！
オ、オラ……オラ……オ、オメの……オラ……

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_032<tab>What is wrong with you?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_032<tab>なんだオメ？　どうした……？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_100_032<tab>Ugh! There is no time for your drivel─the Chaghan mean to strike again!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_100_032<tab>いや、そんなことより、大変なんだよ！
チャガン族が、今度はモル・イローを襲撃しようとしてるんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_033<tab>They've always been prone to violence, but I fear their recent attack on the Qerel has given them a taste for pillaging. They mean to attack Mol Iloh next!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_033<tab>ヤツらケレル族を襲ったことで、
他部族から略奪することに味をしめちまったみてえだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_034<tab>Quickly! We must stop them before they can reach town!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_034<tab>チャガン族はいま、モル・イローの付近に潜んでいる。
襲撃の前に、こちらから乗り込んで倒してやろう！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_035<tab>Damn it all! Again I was distracted by the quiver of her come-hither lips. I'm embarrassed to admit it, but love proves to be more terrifying than any foe.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_035<tab>……情けねえ、何も言えなかった。
だが、恥ずかしいけれど、どんな強敵と戦うよりも、
オラ、気持ちを伝えるのが……怖くてしょうがねえ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_036<tab>This fear, it must be struck out of me. Literally. I want you to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>slap<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me as hard as you can, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Crack your battle-hardened palm across my face.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_036<tab>だから、頼む……前のように、オラを「平手打ち」して、
オラの中から、不安を追い出してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_039<tab>Don't hold back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Slap me so hard my heart skips a beat from the shock of it.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_039<tab>頼む……前のように、オラを「平手打ち」して、
オラの中から、不安を追い出してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_100_039<tab>Don't hold back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Slap me so hard my heart skips a beat from the shock of it.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_100_039<tab>頼む……前のように、オラを「平手打ち」して、
オラの中から、不安を追い出してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_040<tab>Godsdamn, that smarts! Any harder and my heart might've stopped altogether.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_040<tab>くーーーっ、効いたぜ……ありがとよ！
なんだか、オメ、平手打ちまで強くなってんな！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_041<tab>But the fear that once gripped my heart is no more. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Dorgono must know of my love for her. I will shout it from the mountain tops if I have to!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_041<tab>よし、今度こそアイツに気持ちを伝えて、完全復活してやる！
さあ、オラたちも「ドルゴノ」のもとに向かうぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_050<tab>The Chaghan are close by. Overcoming their forces will be no easy task, but we must be especially careful of their leader, Nayaga. He is able to wield the power of Karash to its fullest.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_050<tab>チャガン族は、この先に潜んでる。
ヤツらを率いる族長の「ナヤガ」は手強いぞ。
なんせ、ヤツは「悪鬼憑き」になっても、自我が保てるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_051<tab>When he taps into that strength, he is nigh unbeatable. With our combined might, we may have a chance.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_051<tab>ヤツに「奥の手」を使われたら、オラだけじゃ太刀打ちできねえが、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>がいるなら、なんとかなるかも……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_100_051<tab>Speaking of which... Curious Gorge, are you well enough to fight?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_100_051<tab>ところで、ゴージ、オメは力を取り戻せたのか？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_052<tab>Better than well, for I am in love─with you! I love you, Dorgono. I love you!!!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_052<tab>オ、オ……オラ、オメのことが好きだぁーーーーっ！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_053<tab>Wh-What are you doing, you witless worm!? <var 1A 02 /var>Keep your voice down<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_053<tab>こ、これから戦うってときに、何言ってんだオメ！
大体、声がデカすぎだ！　敵が潜んでんだぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_054<tab>Your bellowing has given us away!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_054<tab>ほら見たことか、ヤツらが来ちまったぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_NAYAGA_000_055<tab>What have we here? Dorgono. You have some nerve showing your face here. If you value your life, you will crawl back to whatever hole you came out of.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_NAYAGA_000_055<tab>何やら騒がしいと思えば、ドルゴノではないか……？
我が部族から抜けた者が何用だ？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_056<tab>Never! What you have done to the Qerel, your own people, is unforgivable! I will not allow you to bring such ruin to others.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_056<tab>オメら、よくもケレル族を襲ってくれたな！
ほかの集落まで狙っているとは、そこまで堕ちたか！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_057<tab>I was too weak before, but thanks to these warriors, the power of Karash is now at my beck and call. I have the strength to put an end to you!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_057<tab>オラは、こいつらのおかげで「古の悪鬼」に乗っ取られなくなった！
悪鬼を制した力で、オメらを倒してやるんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_NAYAGA_000_058<tab>What we do, we do in the name of the Dusk Mother! If you would defy her will, there is only one punishment fit for such heresy.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_NAYAGA_000_058<tab>ふん、聖なる「神憑き」を捨て去るとは罰当たりめが……。
我らの手により、天罰を受けるがいい！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_NAYAGA_000_059<tab>Oh Nhaama, goddess of the dusk, hear me! Grant us the strength to smite our enemies! For one glorious moment, let the blood spilled here slake your unquenchable thirst!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_NAYAGA_000_059<tab>血を求める暗き夜の女神、ナーマよ……！
我に神の力を与えたまええええ！！
ウオオオオオオオオッ！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Curious Gorge. Prepare yourselves!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！　ゴージ！
ヤツらを、ぶちのめしてやるぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_061<tab>Leave it to me, my sweet vixen! I will show them what it truly means to unleash one's inner beast!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_061<tab>うおおおお！　「原初の魂」が湧き上がってきたぞ！
任せてくれ！　オラ、とことん暴れてやる！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_070<tab>We did it! The Chaghan have been brought to heel. Perhaps now I can finally return home.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_070<tab>やったぞ！
チャガン族をやっつけた！
これで、オラはケレル族に戻れるんだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_071<tab>That was quite a display, Curious Gorge. The worm has at last shown himself a warrior.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_071<tab>ゴージ、戦えるようになったんだな！？
オメがこんなに強かったなんて……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_072<tab>Curious Gorge...?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_072<tab>どうした……ゴージ……？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_073<tab>Graaaaaaghhh!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_073<tab>グガガォガォォガォォォォアァァァァァァ！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_074<tab>It's over. We have won! You needn't prove yourself to me any longer!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_074<tab>おい、しっかりしろ！
オメの強さは、よーくわかった！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_075<tab>You have always been so strong, so caring. I know I was mean to you before, but in truth I... I...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_075<tab>オラ、つええヤツが好きだ！
だから、オラ……オラ……

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_076<tab>I love you, Curious Gorge!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_076<tab>オラ、オメのことが好きだーーーー！！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_080<tab>Forgive me. Though only for a moment, it seems my inner beast got the better of me. Again...
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_080<tab>なんてこった……オラ、またやっちまったんだな……。
調子に乗り過ぎちまって、我を忘れて……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_081<tab>So what if it did? The Chaghan have been defeated, and I owe it all to the two of you! When the Qerel hear of this, they are sure to welcome me back with open arms.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_081<tab>でも、チャガン族を倒せたんだ。
ゴージ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、本当にありがとな！
これでやっと、オラはケレル族に受け入れてもらえる。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_082<tab>I will share with them all I have learned of controlling the will of Karash, and I would do it with you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_082<tab>部族に戻ったら、オラがみんなに、
「原初の魂」を制御する術を教えてやるんだ。
そして、ゴージ……オメも、ケレル族の一員にならねえか……？

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_083<tab>Come away with me, Curious Gorge, and together we can start anew with the Qerel!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_083<tab>オラの婿になって、部族の再建を手伝ってくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_084<tab>How long I have waited to hear those words. <sigh> Yet sadly, I must decline. While it is true we defeated the Chaghan, I cannot dismiss the fact that I succumbed to my inner beast. If I had turned on you when you needed me most, I could never forgive myself.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_084<tab>……すまねえが、
オラ、今回の件でまだまだ未熟だって痛感したんだ。
もう「原初の魂」に飲まれることはねえと思ってたんだがな……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_085<tab>A man who lacks such self-discipline is undeserving of a wonderful woman such as you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_085<tab>オラ、嫁をもらうにはまだ早い。
もっともっと、修行しなきゃいけねえみてえだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_086<tab>I must continue training to master my inner beast and become the realm's greatest─well, <var 1A 02 /var>second<var 1A 01 /var> greatest─warrior. When that day comes, I will find you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_086<tab>そして、いつか一番の戦士……
いや、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が一番なら、
せめて、二番の戦士になってから、オラ……オメのもとにいくぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_087<tab>Second? Surely you mean third. The honor of being the realm's second greatest warrior is mine, and I doubt you will ever surpass me.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_087<tab>そうか……わかった。
でも、二番の戦士はオラだぞ！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の次に強いのは、オラだからな！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_088<tab>Argh! Just wait and see! I'll rip those horns off that pretty little head of yours and─
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_088<tab>な、なに言ってんだオメ！
二番の戦士はオラに決まってんだろうが！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_089<tab>Hah hah hah. Well, you can certainly try. I will gladly fight to keep my title, and can think of no better challenger. Until then, take care of yourself.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_DORGONO_000_089<tab>その決着も、いつかつけような……。
それじゃあ、オラ、ケレル族のもとへ戻る。
ゴージ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、達者でな！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_090<tab>I can scarcely believe you overcame that monster Nayaga on your own.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_090<tab>オメ、あんな化け物みたいなヤツを、
よくも、ひとりで相手できたもんだよな……。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_091<tab>The title of realm's greatest warrior is rightfully yours, but never forget: should you slack for even a moment, I'll be there to take it from you!
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_091<tab>やっぱり、最強の戦士はオメだ。
でも、忘れるなよ、すぐ後ろには二番のオラがいるからな。
オラがいつでも、一番の座を狙ってるんだぞ……！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_092<tab>Though I suppose after today's exertion, we've both earned a moment's respite. Let us return home. I yearn for the shores of Limsa, and my brother is no doubt sick with worry besides.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_092<tab>そういや、兄者が心配してるだろうな。
一緒に、モラビー造船廠へ行って、
「ブロークン・マウンテン」を安心させてやろう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_100_095<tab>I have caused you and my brother nothing but grief. I mean to apologize, but I fear he will not like what I have to say.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_100_095<tab>今回もふたりに迷惑かけちまったな……。
オラ、兄者に言わなきゃならねえことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_100<tab>It gladdens me to see you both returned hale and whole. Once more my brother's inner beast burns fiercely within him, and from what he has told me, Dorgono has at last been reunited with her people.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、今回の尽力に感謝する！
君のおかげで、弟が力を取り戻し、無事に帰ってきた。
ドルゴノも大変だったようだが、なんとか部族に戻ったそうだな。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_101<tab>Our ventures in the East were not without trouble, though. Much of which could have been avoided if not for my failings.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_101<tab>兄者、今回のことで、またふたりに迷惑をかけちまって、
オラは、教官の器じゃねえって痛感した。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_102<tab>I know you wish for me to resume leading the Maelstrom's warriors, Brother, but I am unworthy for the role. I myself am still in need of training, and that is why I would dedicate myself to honing my skills, that I might someday be worthy of the position again.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_102<tab>ワガママ言ってすまねえが、戦士隊には戻れない。
オラ……まだまだ、修行を続けたいんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_103<tab>I suspected you might say as much. Very well, then. If you truly believe this is best, I will not stop you. Find your own path. When you're ready, I'm sure it will lead back to us someday.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_103<tab>……お前はきっと、そう言うと思っていたぞ。
わかった……戦士隊のことは私に任せて、
お前は、己の道を行くがいい。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_104<tab>Thank you, Brother! I must be off to Hidden Falls. There's much to do if I'm ever to be a match for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> or Dorgono.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_CURIOUSGORGE_000_104<tab>ありがてえ！
それじゃあ、さっそく隠れ滝に戻って、修行だ修行！

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_105<tab>I sometimes wonder if he will ever be satisfied. Though I confess I admire his fervor. You have inspired him to reach new heights, and I have every confidence he will emerge from his training a new man. Nevertheless, I hope we may look to you for aid should we find ourselves on hard times.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_105<tab>ふう……大きな壁を乗り越えたものの、相も変わらずだな……。
これに懲りることなく、これからも我ら兄弟と、
付き合ってもらえたら幸いだ……では、また会おう。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_200<tab>This concludes the warrior quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: Stormblood. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_200<tab>「戦士」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「戦士」のジョブクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_201<tab>※ FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers must be registered to your service account.
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Shadowbringers.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_201<tab>1.「漆黒のヴィランズ」のプレイ権を所有している。
2.「メインクエスト：漆黒のヴィランズ」の、
　「漆黒のヴィランズ」を完了する。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_202<tab>※ You must have completed the role quest “To Have Loved and Lost.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_202<tab>3.TANKロールの、
　「ロールクエスト」を完了する。

source: TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_203<tab>Once you have done so, the next warrior quest will be available from Curious Gorge.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR700_02904_SYSTEM_100_203<tab>条件を満たし、隠れ滝の「キュリアス・ゴージ」に話しかけ、
新たなジョブクエストを開始しましょう！
